mapper.sql: YEAR, MONTH, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, DISTRICT, PLATFORM, S_CAT1_NAME, SHOP_ID, SHOP_NAME, P_COUNT, M_SLAES_COUNT, M_SALES_VOLUME, M_SALES_VOLUME_LEVEL, UNIT_TYPE, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, STATUS, REMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3
mapper.select:
select
,
from tb_sta_cat_shop
ORDER BY ${orderBy} desc

select t.*,t.totalVolume totalVolume from ( select SHOP_NAME shopName,PROVINCE,PLATFORM,s_cat1_name sCat1Name,sum(M_SALES_VOLUME) totalVolume from tb_sta_cat_shop
GROUP BY PROVINCE,PLATFORM,s_cat1_name,SHOP_NAME ORDER BY totalVolume desc limit #{pageRow},#{pageSize})t

select count(1) from( select 1 from tb_sta_cat_shop
GROUP BY PROVINCE,PLATFORM,s_cat1_name,SHOP_NAME)t

select t.*,t.totalCount totalCount from ( select SHOP_NAME shopName,PROVINCE,PLATFORM,s_cat1_name sCat1Name,sum(M_SLAES_COUNT) totalCount from tb_sta_cat_shop
GROUP BY PROVINCE,PLATFORM,s_cat1_name,SHOP_NAME ORDER BY totalCount desc limit #{pageRow},#{pageSize})t

select count(1) from ( select 1 from tb_sta_cat_shop
GROUP BY PROVINCE,PLATFORM,s_cat1_name,SHOP_NAME)t
mapper.insert: insert into tb_sta_cat_shop (ID, YEAR, MONTH, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, DISTRICT, PLATFORM, S_CAT1_NAME, SHOP_ID, SHOP_NAME, P_COUNT, M_SLAES_COUNT, M_SALES_VOLUME, M_SALES_VOLUME_LEVEL, UNIT_TYPE, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, STATUS, REMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3, DATE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sCat1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mSlaesCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mSalesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mSalesVolumeLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{unitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update tb_sta_cat_shop
YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATFORM = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_CAT1_NAME = #{sCat1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOP_NAME = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_COUNT = #{pCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
M_SLAES_COUNT = #{mSlaesCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
M_SALES_VOLUME = #{mSalesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
M_SALES_VOLUME_LEVEL = #{mSalesVolumeLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMARK1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARK2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARK3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=CHAR},
DATE = #{date,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_sta_cat_shop set YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORM = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_CAT1_NAME = #{sCat1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_NAME = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_COUNT = #{pCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, M_SLAES_COUNT = #{mSlaesCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, M_SALES_VOLUME = #{mSalesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, M_SALES_VOLUME_LEVEL = #{mSalesVolumeLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARK2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARK3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=CHAR}, DATE = #{date,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_sta_cat_shop set YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORM = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_CAT1_NAME = #{sCat1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_NAME = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_COUNT = #{pCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, M_SLAES_COUNT = #{mSlaesCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, M_SALES_VOLUME = #{mSalesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, M_SALES_VOLUME_LEVEL = #{mSalesVolumeLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARK2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARK3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
